quizContent.question: Let's say you have Category as an entity that represents all the product categories on the site. What would be a RESTful URI to look up all categories?
The site also has a Product entity. This has been designed to be a first level entity like Category. What would be a good RESTful URI for all products?
If the Product entity were to have been designed as a sub-resource under the Category entity, what would the URI for Product be?
